    • UNDERSIDAN

Moment1/Frontend-baserad webbutveckling

Porpose:

  • Gain Insight into NodeJS Usage:

    • Understand how NodeJS can be employed to facilitate the development of a website. Explore the various capabilities and features that NodeJS brings to the web development process.

  • Automate Tasks Using Command-Line Tools in NodeJs:

    • Acquire the ability to automate tasks efficiently through the utilization of command-line tools in NodeJS. Explore the advantages and streamlining benefits that automation provides in the context of website development.

  • Establish an Automated Development Environment with Git and NodeJs:

    • Build proficiency in creating an automated development environment by integrating Git and NodeJS. Enable automatic deployment of website updates via Git repositories, providing a seamless and efficient development workflow.

  • Automate Transpilation and Minification of CSS, HTML, and JavaScript:

    • Develop skills in automating the transpilation and minification processes for CSS, HTML, and JavaScript. Understand the significance of these automated tasks in enhancing code efficiency, reducing file sizes, and optimizing website performance.

  • Automate Image Optimization:

    • Master the process of automating image optimization with a focus on contemporary formats like WebP or AVIF. Understand the pivotal role of image optimization in enhancing website load times and elevating the overall user experience.

In Summary:

This assignment is designed to offer practical expertise in harnessing the power of NodeJS for diverse web development tasks. It encompasses the implementation of efficient automation through command-line tools, coupled with the establishment of a seamless development environment using Git. The primary objective is to streamline critical processes, including transpilation, minification, and image optimization. Through these efforts, the aim is to significantly improve the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the development workflow.
